history: TTS !b <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break strength='strong' /> an assistant that gives you transportation directions. <break strength='strong' /> Your conversation will be recorded for research purposes to help improve our system. <break strength='strong' /> Your enkkkrrypted phone number will be stored in a secure manner and will not be shared with anyone. <break strength='strong' /> This is so we can keep your preferences for future calls. <break strength='strong' /> Your participation is voluntaaaaary. <break strength='strong' /> By continuing to use this system you confirm that you are at least 18 and that you agree that we may use the data we record for research. <break strength='strong' /> We may share the data with researchers, however no personal information will be shared. <break strength='x-strong' /> At any point in the conversation, you may ask me to repeat something or to pause. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>

USER In addition the following week Monday April 15th through Monday, April 22nd is spring break and all schools will be closed. We look forward to welcoming students when they return from spring break on Tuesday, April 23rd.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
